/*
-an array with images to show -- DONE
-dynamically create a UI element for each image in the array -- DONE
-clicking any gallery image will trigger a site overlay and the image will be displayed in the overlay
-clicking the forward button will show the next image
-clicking the back button will show the previous image
-clicking the cross will close the overlay

Static UI:
-an overlay gallery set to hidden -- DONE
-back/forward buttons: always active, loop navigation -- DONE
-close button to close the gallery overlay -- DONE
*/
